message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and the impact it can have, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase it for $1200000. This is a special opportunity tailored just for you, aiming to maximize the benefits for both parties involved.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of our budget.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand the importance of staying within budget constraints. In light of your proposal, I am pleased to offer the product for $950000. This price reflects a thoughtful compromise while still allowing us to cover our costs and ensure the continued quality of our offerings.
I appreciate the compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within our budget.

I understand your concerns regarding the budget, Bob. In order to reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I propose to offer the product for $900000. This price allows us to maintain our profit margin while still providing you with excellent value for your investment.
I appreciate the revised offer, but I'm still a bit above my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $850000. I believe this is a fair price for both parties.

Considering your commitment to the product and your efforts to find a fair price, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose to offer the product for $875000. This price reflects a reasonable compromise between our interests, ensuring value for both parties involved.

I appreciate the continued negotiation, but I'm still a bit above my target. I'm willing to meet you at $850000. I believe this is a fair price for both parties and I'm eager to move forward with the purchase.
